creator: dhill@724.com
text:
When I build the class with JBuilder .. it works fine .. when I build it with 
ANT I get this error.

Where and when do you get this error? In what circumstances? Does the message
indicate which class contains the problem? What compiler are you using in Ant?
creator: skeet@pobox.com
conor@apache.org
text:
This may have been an issue because the first beta was compiled under JDK 1.4
and not set to support early class file formats.

Can you please test with the second beta due out very soon and reopen if there
continues to be a problem.
